text: We're less than half - way through season 12 of The Bachelorette but we've already witnessed contestant JoJo Fletcher, 25, lock lips with numerous hunky suitors, dump a hotheaded villain and stun in a parade of form - fitting sequin dresses. If past seasons are any indication, steamy beach vacations, tearful goodbyes and, of course, many more make - out sessions are soon to come. No matter what plays out, the show's longtime make - up artist Gina Modica will be on hand to keep the Texas - born beauty looking flawless. Since The Bachelor spin - off's debut season in 2003, Gina told FEMAIL,'the make - up has evolved a huge amount. Especially because of social media, the women are much more
